data.script: Read each word out loud. We will use the timer and play the games in the sidebar for additional practice.
I will say several words from the lesson. Each time I say a new word, click the correct letter(s) to make the word.
Today we are learning words that end with /at/. Let's read the words together.
Let's see how well you have learned the words in this lesson. (Mastery Goal: all words correct in 10 - 15 seconds.)

I will say a word from the lesson. First, tap a circle as you say each sound in the word. Next, tap one or more letters to go in the same box as the circle. Tap the ball in a box to erase the letters in the box. Tap the ball again to add new letters.
You will read this 3 times. I will use the timer, but focus on reading the words smoothly and correctly.
I will point to a word. If you read it correctly, I will check the box. If not, it is ok. We will practice it at the end.
Using warmups.instructions. This should never display.
